title: Top of the World NCAA Mens College Town Crew Adjustable Cotton Crew Hat Cap
features: Alabama Crimson Tide men's apparel hat. Officially licensed NCAA Collegiate product
Material: 100% Cotton with adjustable strapback. One size fits most.
3D Embroidered Logo on Front- Embroidered City on Back. Unstructured Fit, Low Crown, Curved Bill

You will turn heads in this Alabama Crimson tide hat, perfect for showing your University pride! This Alabama dad hat is made of comfortable yet quality-durable material, and features a 3D embroidered School Logo on front-with Embroidered Campus location on the back. This Alabama hat features the college town Tuscaloosa embroidered on the back. Roll Tide!
description: This traditional style cap features washed cotton fabric for a lived-in look from day one, eyelets for ventilation, a curved front bill, and an adjustable slide strap for a perfect fit. With the city of the school on the back
